tool_description: API for generating documents (contracts, letters, invoices) from templates by populating them with XML, JSON, Excel data. The API integrates documents' creation and delivery features. Developers can work from the back-end or web embed. They can also integrate with their databases such as Oracle/SQL Server/MySQL to automate document creation from database data.
name: EDocGen
title: EDocGen

api_list.name: /api/v1/documents
api_list.description: Returns all template details including template ids
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://murthyts-edocgen-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/documents"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "murthyts-edocgen-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://murthyts-edocgen-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/documents"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "murthyts-edocgen-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/v1/document/markers/{templateid}
api_list.description: Returns markers present in the template
